text: Ludwig Holzgethan, since 1855 von Holzgethan, since 1865 Baron (Freiherr) von Holzgethan (October 1, 1800 in Vienna – June 12, 1876 in Vienna) was an Austrian statesman. == External links == * Otto Category:1818 births Category:1876 deaths Category:19th-century Ministers-President of Austria Category:Ministers-President of Austria Category:19th-century Austrian people Category:Barons of Austria Category:Politicians from Vienna
title: Ludwig Freiherr von Holzgethan
